metadata.name: Luveris 82 5 iU 1mL Kit
metadata.composition: 82 5 iU 1mL Lyme disease vaccine recombinant OspA

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For prophylactic treatment of Lyme Disease

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: OspA lipoprotein is a single polypeptide chain of 270 amino acids It is a vaccination used to prevent Lyme Disease
